snippet: Formula One will award double points for the last race of the season starting next year. The aim is to make it less likely that the title will be decided early.
abstract: Formula One will award double points for the last automobile race of the season starting next year; aim is to make it less likely that the title will be decided early.
lead_paragraph: Formula One will award double points for the last race of the season starting next year. The aim is to make it less likely that the title will be decided early.
